S.FORM: Mali Gaga kska Meycow ka Mali, 17 00 N, 4 00 W ka gaga na nniqan. Kana ka knlbangan na o 1,240,192 sq km(hangan na o Tg24) (knlbanga dxgal o 1,220,190 sq km, knlbangan qsiya o 20,002 sq km). Kana ka sejiqun o niqan 17,467,108 hiyi. Gaga Bamako ka pusu alang paru, jiyax 22 idas 9 ka jiyax skrayan klwaan. Manu ka dxgal Mali ga wada sugan 34.10 ka dxgal qpahan, 10.20 ka dxgal bbuyu, rahuq dxgal do niqan 55.70 na. Bukung klwaan ta sayang o kiya ka Ibrahim Boubacar Ke√Øta, pnaah hngkawas2013 idas 9 jiyax 4pnrajing kmlawa klwaan.
